sourcing.instructions: - Arsenic: Obtain from a chemical supply company or laboratory supplier (ensure safety protocols).
steps: - Arsenic: Obtain from a chemical supply company or laboratory supplier (ensure safety protocols).
1. In a well-ventilated laboratory, wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, lab coat).
preparation.raw_text: 1. In a well-ventilated laboratory, wear appropriate PPE (gloves, goggles, lab coat).

steps: 1. Preheat an oven or furnace to 150째C (302째F).
heating.raw_text: 1. Preheat an oven or furnace to 150째C (302째F).

steps: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool gradually to room temperature, approximately 1-2 hours.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After 2 hours, turn off the oven and allow the mold to cool gradually to room temperature, approximately 1-2 hours.

steps: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid material from the mold.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, carefully remove the solid material from the mold.
